category: Personnel, management and administration procedures; Operations and service delivery
description: Packages cannot be traced to corresponding packages or groups of packages from an earlier point within the repository’s information lifecycle.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Record appropriate provenance information, detailing interactions undertaken during receipt, ingest, preservation and dissemination processes In the event of risk’s execution:
- Define policy and procedures to determine whether package should be disposed of, returned or retained
name: Non-traceability of received, archived or disseminated package
notes: - Are mechanisms in place to record the origins and lifecycle of information packages and any transactions or interactions that they have been subject to?
preMitigationNotes: - Repository fails to maintain appropriate documentation describing the origins and lifecycle of an archived package and any transactions or interactions to which it has been subject
